descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Franz Wagner is smooth as silk as he drives into the paint and knocks down the turnaround basket for the Magic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Franz Wagner knocks down bucket) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Franz Wagner drains the smooth turnaround bucket

videos.description: Saddiq Bey gathers the rock and knocks down the 3-pointer from the top of the key.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saddiq Bey hits the trey vs. Orlando Magic) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Pistons' ball movement leads to a Saddiq Bey triple

videos.description: Franz Wagner hauls in the dime from Terrence Ross and slams it home to give the Magic the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Franz Wagner soars for the big-time flush) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Franz Wagner soars for the big-time flush

videos.description: Markelle Fultz Eurosteps his way into a Magic's and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Markelle Fultz with the and-1 bucket) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Markelle Fultz gets the hoop and the harm

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart gathers the dish from Saben Lee and rocks the rim for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saben Lee makes a sweet dish) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Stewart throws it down with authority

videos.description: Robin Lopez won't be denied as he muscles through his defender for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Robin Lopez with the and-1 bucket) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robin Lopez fights off his defender for the and-1

videos.description: Clear the runway as Saben Lee hauls in the lob from Rodney McGruder and unloads a massive jam to extend the Pistons' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saben Lee takes flight for alley-oop slam) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saben Lee takes flight for the alley-oop slam

videos.description: Saddiq Bey's 51-point performance leads the Pistons to a 134-120 road victory over the Magic.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saddiq Bey was automatic as he drops 51 points in Pistons 134-120 win) 2022/03/17 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saddiq Bey was automatic as he drops 51 points in Pistons 134-120 win
